meta.description: Language labels for the dm_calendar extension in the Flexform formular

languageKey.label: Year
Month
Week
Day
Hour
Minute
Second
General preferences
Calendarname (define a individual name for this calendarplugin - will be shown in frontend)
Select View Type of the calendar (Year/Month/Day or a dynamic jQuery Calendar)
Available Views
Choose at least one category to display the categories events
Appointment View Settings
Show ICS Link (iCalendar Download - .ics file)
Show QR Code to scan and share the URL of the event
Exclude selected events from calendar
Include selected events into calendar
Month View Settigns
Display Category Colors
Deactivate Category Colors
Show below calendar
Also highlight appointments
Please chosse how to display the weekday name in monthview
Short weekday names (Mon Tue Wed..)
Full weekday names (Monday Tuesday Wednesday...)
Template
Limit appointments (use in template: {settings.appointmentAmountLimit})
Use own templates
Choose a 'SimpleCalendar Themes Bundle'
Template directory (e.g. fileadmin/templates/extensions/dm_simplecalendar/Resources/Private/Templates)
Partial directory (e.g. fileadmin/templates/extensions/dm_simplecalendar/Resources/Private/Partials)
Layout directory (e.g. fileadmin/templates/extensions/dm_simplecalendar/Resources/Private/Layouts)
